attributes.action: give all serving and former serving gurkhas and their close family free shoes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my opinion that all serving and former gurkhas and their close family should be given free shoes and that they should be given free housing in mp's second and third homes. Its only fair !!. Except for jaqui smiths house as we dont want them getting into watching porn movies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
